languages.text: Кто-то приспособил старые контейнеры для создания ритуального захоронения. Останки имперских солдат сложили внутрь много позже их гибели.

traits.locale_text: [draft] в ящиках находятся кости и прах, это похоже на захоронение

languages.text: Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.
languages.original_text: Кто-то приспособил старые контейнеры для создания ритуального захоронения. Останки имперских солдат сложили внутрь много позже их гибели.

traits.locale_text: Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.
Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.
Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.
Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.
Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.
Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.

languages.text: 这些老旧的容器被改造成了仪式性的坟墓。帝国士兵阵亡之后，他们的遗体被存放在里面，已经存放了很久很久。
languages.original_text: Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.

traits.locale_text: 这些老旧的容器被改造成了仪式性的坟墓。帝国士兵阵亡之后，他们的遗体被存放在里面，已经存放了很久很久。

languages.text: Jemand hat alte Container zu einem zeremoniellen Grab umfunktioniert. Die Überreste von Imperiumssoldaten wurden lange nach ihrem Tod in das Grab gelebt.
languages.original_text: Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.

traits.locale_text: Jemand hat alte Container zu einem zeremoniellen Grab umfunktioniert. Die Überreste von Imperiumssoldaten wurden lange nach ihrem Tod in das Grab gelebt.

languages.text: Alguien ha dispuesto unos viejos contenedores para improvisar una especie de tumba ceremonial. Los restos de varios soldados del Imperium se depositaron en ellos mucho tiempo después de su muerte.
languages.original_text: Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.

traits.locale_text: Alguien ha dispuesto unos viejos contenedores para improvisar una especie de tumba ceremonial. Los restos de varios soldados del Imperium se depositaron en ellos mucho tiempo después de su muerte.

languages.text: Quelqu'un s'est servi de vieux conteneurs pour bâtir un mausolée. Les restes de soldats de l'Imperium ont été placés à l'intérieur longtemps après leur mort.
languages.original_text: Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un s'est servi de vieux conteneurs pour bâtir un mausolée. Les restes de soldats de l'Imperium ont été placés à l'intérieur longtemps après leur mort.

languages.text: 誰かが古い容器を再利用して儀式用の墓を作った。帝国の兵士たちの遺骨は、死後長い年月を経て中に安置された。
languages.original_text: Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.

traits.locale_text: 誰かが古い容器を再利用して儀式用の墓を作った。帝国の兵士たちの遺骨は、死後長い年月を経て中に安置された。

languages.text: Birisi, sembolik bir kabir inşa etmek için eski konteynerleri kullanmış. İmparatorluk askerlerinin kalıntıları, ölümlerinden çok uzun zaman sonra içlerine yerleştirilmiş.
languages.original_text: Someone repurposed old containers to build a ceremonial tomb. The remains of Imperium soldiers were placed inside a long time after their death.

traits.locale_text: Birisi sembolik bir kabir inşa etmek için eski konteynerleri kullanmış. İmparatorluk askerlerinin kalıntıları, ölümlerinden çok uzun zaman sonra içlerine yerleştirilmiş.
